mapper.sql: ID, CreateTime, ModifyTime, VenueID, Name, Image, Price, Introduce
mapper.select: select count(0) from Coach where VenueID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into Coach (ID, CreateTime, ModifyTime, VenueID, Name, Image, Price, Introduce) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{venueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update Coach
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VenueID = #{venueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
